topics.body:
"@Sollace":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b5183863687258ae004c11#post_55b5183863687258ae004c11
(btw you don't have to use @code@ tags to properly use asterisks)
(just type it like this)
[bq]====*stuff*====[/bq](those == tags escape formatting)
(and yes they can escape themselves too which is how i was able to type that)
topics.author: 53f29d1b6368725f76ba0100

topics.body:
"@SuperSupermario24":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b5188363687219b7000214#post_55b5188363687219b7000214
Oh thanks. :D

I saw it used before but forgot what it was.

I tried: 
[bq]==__*stuff*__==[/bq] but that made it italic.
topics.author: 53862ca46368724bd0e40400

topics.body:
"@Sollace":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b5194e636872592e00297f#post_55b5194e636872592e00297f
Interestingly, the official syntax help lists [==[====] and [====]==] as the noparse tags, but == and == work just fine as well, as I accidentally discovered one time.
And now to be gone for most of the rest of the day, cya all.
(Might be able to be on my iPad.)
